    • showPopupForColorOrBound

      public static void showPopupForColorOrBound(int bound)
      Shows a pop-up window for the user to choose a color or the number of students to swap/move
      Parameters:
      bound - the maximum number of students to move | -1 if the user has to choose a color

    • getNewUndecoratedStage

      private static javafx.stage.Stage getNewUndecoratedStage()

      Returns:
      an undecorated Stage

    • changeScene

      public void changeScene(String resourceName, boolean fullscreen)
      Changes the scene showed on the gui
      Parameters:
      resourceName - the name of the scene to show (part of the .fxml file path)
      fullscreen - true if the scene has to be in full screen mode

    • startGameScene

      public void startGameScene()
      Draws the scene at the start of the game

    • sendMessageToController

      public void sendMessageToController(GameLobby lobby, GameState gameState, List<String> actions, String username)
      Sends a message to the controller containing the current GameLobby, GameState, list of action for the player to choose from and the username of the player
      Parameters:
      lobby - the current GameLobby - null if not needed
      gameState - the current GameState - null if not needed
      actions - the list of actions for the player to choose from
      username - the name of the player

    • askCharacterParameters

      public void askCharacterParameters(CharacterName name, GuiCharacterType characterType)
      Calls a controller method to ask the user the parameters to play the selected character
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the character to play
      characterType - the GuiCharacterType of the selected character

    • showErrorDialog

      public void showErrorDialog(String message, boolean closeApplication)
      Shows a pop-up window with an error message
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be shown
      closeApplication - true if the application has to be closed
